title: Surprise! Kanye fake-auditioned for 'American Idol'
text:
Surprise! Kanye fake-auditioned for 'American Idol' American Idol's final season will kick off with one surprise guest. Post to Facebook Surprise! Kanye fake-auditioned for 'American Idol' American Idol's final season will kick off with one surprise guest. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Surprise! Kanye fake-auditioned for 'American Idol' 9:17 a.m. EDT October 12, 2015 Surprise! Kanye fake-auditioned for 'American Idol' (Photo: Instagram) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
American Idol' s final season will kick off with one surprise guest. 
And unlike most celebrity guests on Idol , who stop by the show to perform or guest-judge,Kanye West surprised everyone—including the judges' table—by staging a fake audition at the show's San Francisco casting this weekend. 
Kim K. was also there, confirming Kanye's faux-dition with this Instagram of judge Jennifer Lopez looking very amused. Kanye West auditioning for American Idol. pic.twitter.com/vJveHArjGA — HIP HOP FACTS (@OnlyHipHopFacts) October 11, 2015 
Showing up on Idol is a classic Kanye move, from a rapper who's more recently spent his time chasing his haute-couture dreams than courting Middle America. Well, the man does have a country of voters to win over before 2020 . A video posted by American Idol (@americanidol) on Oct 11, 2015 at 12:34pm PDT Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1LqDSY7 More Stories
